sen.j: 姉小路 済俊（あねがこうじ なるとし/なりとし、永正2年（1505年） - 大永7年（1527年））は戦国時代 (日本)の公家、飛騨国国司。
sen.e: Narutoshi (also called Naritoshi) ANEGAKOJI (1505 - 1527) was a Court noble who lived during the Sengoku Period (Period of Warring States), and he also served as the governor of Hida Province.
Narutoshi (also called Naritoshi) ANEGAKOJI (1505 - 1527) was a Court noble who lived during the Sengoku period (Period of Warring States), and also served as the governor of Hida Province.
sen.cmt: the Sengoku periodのperiodは統一用語に従い、小文字にしました。不要な箇所は削除しました。
sen.e: Narutoshi (also called Naritoshi) ANEGAKOJI (1505 - 1527) was a Court noble who lived during the Sengoku period (Period of Warring States), and also served as the governor of Hida Province.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 姉小路済継の嫡男で、姉小路高綱の兄。
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Naritsugu ANEGAKOJI, and he had a younger brother named Takatsuna ANEGAKOJI.
He was the eldest son of Naritsugu ANEGAKOJI, and he had a younger brother named Takatsuna ANEGAKOJI.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
sen.e: He was the eldest son of Naritsugu ANEGAKOJI, and he had a younger brother named Takatsuna ANEGAKOJI.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 夭折したが、家系図によると秀綱、清堯という2人の子があったとされる。
sen.e: He died young before reaching a mature age, but according to their family tree, he had two sons: Hidetsuna and Kiyotaka.
He died at an early age, but according to their family tree, he had two sons: Hidetsuna and Kiyotaka.
sen.cmt: He died at an early ageで良いと思います。
sen.e: He died at an early age, but according to their family tree, he had two sons: Hidetsuna and Kiyotaka.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 父済継の死後家督を継ぎ飛騨国司となるも1527年、23歳の若さで急死。
sen.e: After his father Naritsugu died, he succeeded to the head of the family and became the governor of Hida Province, but in 1527, he suddenly died young at the age of 23.
After his father Naritsugu died, he succeeded to the head of the family and became the Governor of Hida Province, but in 1527, he suddenly died at the age of 23.
sen.cmt: the Governorの方が良いと思います。youngは特に必要ないと思います。
sen.e: After his father Naritsugu died, he succeeded to the head of the family and became the Governor of Hida Province, but in 1527, he suddenly died at the age of 23.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 後、同族と思われる田向重継が家督を継承するもかつての勢いはなかった。
sen.e: Subsequently, Shigetsugu TAMUKAI, who is thought to have been from the same family, succeeded to the head of the family, but the family was not as influential as they had been once.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Subsequently, Shigetsugu TAMUKAI, who is thought to have been from the same family, succeeded to the head of the family, but the family was not as influential as they had once been.
sen.cmt: onceの位置を変更しました。
sen.e: Subsequently, Shigetsugu TAMUKAI, who is thought to have been from the same family, succeeded to the head of the family, but the family was not as influential as they had once been.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: また弟高綱も3年後の1530年以降の消息が掴めていない。
sen.e: Also, it is unknown what his younger brother Takatsuna did in and after 1530, three years after Narutoshi's death.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Also, the whereabouts of his younger brother Takatsuna after 1530 (three years after Narutoshi's death) is unknown.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、全体を修正しました。
sen.e: Also, the whereabouts of his younger brother Takatsuna after 1530 (three years after Narutoshi's death) is unknown.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 更にこちらも同族の江馬時盛も直頼以下三木氏の台頭を抑えきれず、以後姉小路家は没落。
sen.e: Additionally, Tokimori EMA, who was also from the same family, could not restrain Naoyori MITSUKI and other members of the Mitsuki clan from spreading their influence, and the circumstances of the Anegakoji family went to rack and ruin afterward.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Additionally, Tokimori EMA, who was also from the same family, could not restrain Naoyori MITSUKI and other members of the Mitsuki clan from spreading their influence, and the Anegakoji family fell afterwards.
sen.cmt: afterwardsです。不要な箇所は削除しました。
sen.e: Additionally, Tokimori EMA, who was also from the same family, could not restrain Naoyori MITSUKI and other members of the Mitsuki clan from spreading their influence, and the Anegakoji family fell afterwards.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 1556年に重継が三木直頼の子良頼(のちの嗣頼)に滅ぼされた事で事実上姉小路家は断絶した。
sen.e: The Anegakoji family practically became extinct when Shigetsuna was defeated by Yoshiyori (later called Tsuguyori), who was a son of Naoyori MITSUKI, in 1556.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: The Anegakoji family became extinct when Shigetsuna was defeated by Yoshiyori (later called Tsuguyori), the son of Naoyori MITSUKI, in 1556.
sen.cmt: 不要な箇所は削除しました。the son of Naoyori MITSUKIで良いと思います。
sen.e: The Anegakoji family became extinct when Shigetsuna was defeated by Yoshiyori (later called Tsuguyori), the son of Naoyori MITSUKI, in 1556.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 以後良頼の朝廷工作でその子自綱が姉小路の名跡を継承すると、時盛以下江馬氏と小島家の小島時光もこれに従属した。
sen.e: After that, Yoshiyori's son Koretsuna succeeded to the family name of Anegakoji as a result of Yoshiyori's lobbying at the Imperial Court, and then Tokimori and other members from the Ema clan and Tokimitsu KOJIMA from the Kojima family decided to follow him.

When Yoshiyori's son Koretsuna later succeeded to the family name of Anegakoji as a result of Yoshiyori maneuvering the Imperial Court, Tokimori and other members from the Ema clan and Tokimitsu KOJIMA from the Kojima family decided to follow him.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、一部修正しました。
sen.e: When Yoshiyori's son Koretsuna later succeeded to the family name of Anegakoji as a result of Yoshiyori maneuvering the Imperial Court, Tokimori and other members from the Ema clan and Tokimitsu KOJIMA from the Kojima family decided to follow him.
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: また済俊の嫡男秀綱は名跡を継承した自綱の子秀綱とは同名の別人の可能性が高い。
sen.e: Narutoshi's eldest son Hidetsuna was most likely a different person from Koretsuna's son named Hidetsuna who succeeded to the family name of Anegakoji, and recently, some people has begun to think that Shigetsugu, who was thought to have been a member originated from the Anegakoji family, and Narutoshi's younger brother Takatsuna were the same person.
Moreover, Narutoshi's eldest legitimate son Hidetsuna was most likely a different person from Koretsuna's son named Hidetsuna (Koretsuna is a person who succeeded to the family name of Anegakoji.)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処嫡男はlegitimateを入れた方が良いと思います。文を自然にするため、一部修正しました。
sen.e: Moreover, Narutoshi's eldest legitimate son Hidetsuna was most likely a different person from Koretsuna's son named Hidetsuna (Koretsuna is a person who succeeded to the family name of Anegakoji.)
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: 同族と見られていた重継は近年になって弟高綱と同一人物との説もある。
sen.e: Recently, some people say that Shigetsugu, who was thought to have been a member originated from the Anegakoji family, and Narutoshi's younger brother Takatsuna were the same person
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処文を自然にするため、一部修正しました。
sen.e: Recently, some people say that Shigetsugu, who was thought to have been a member originated from the Anegakoji family, and Narutoshi's younger brother Takatsuna were the same person
sen.cmt: 修正なし

sen.j: そうすると姉小路家を継いだのは高綱という事になるものの、弟高綱、嫡男秀綱、次男清堯いずれにも家督を継承したという記録はない。
sen.e: This opinion means Takatsuna eventually succeeded to the head of the Anegakoji family, but there is no record which provides evidence of his younger brother Takatsuna, his eldest son Hidetsuna, or his second son Kiyotaka having succeeded to the head of the family.

This means Takatsuna eventually succeeded to the head of the Anegakoji family, but there is no record stating his younger brother Takatsuna, his eldest son Hidetsuna, or his second son Kiyotaka succeeded to the head of the family.
sen.cmt: 文を自然にするため、一部修正しました。
sen.e: This means Takatsuna eventually succeeded to the head of the Anegakoji family, but there is no record stating his younger brother Takatsuna, his eldest son Hidetsuna, or his second son Kiyotaka succeeded to the head of the family.
sen.cmt: 修正なし
